Audio.Author: Juha Honkala
Audio.Comments: The bird came in after the short playback of Helmeted Manakin, it kept quite high up, some 5-8 m above us, flying around and calling. Black plumage with red frontal crest, frontal crest shorter than in pure Helmeted Manakin, upper back pale ochraceous yellow. bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
Audio.Sub-species: Antilophia galeata x Chiroxiphia caudata hybrid
